data: Barton farm-house | creek | Kennett Square | Philadelphia stage-road

At noon, on the first Saturday of March, 1796, there was an unusual stir at the old Barton farm-house, just across the creek to the eastward, as you leave Kennett Square by the Philadelphia stage-road.
